title: That Metal Show S12E07 HDTV 1080i (Scott Gorham, Ricky Warwick,
description:
Episodes of That Metal Show are finally being broadcast in HD on the Palladia channel.  Here is the first full episode of the show ever broadcast in HD, season 12 episode 7.  The guests are Scott Gorham, Ricky Warwick (Thin Lizzy) and Neil Fallon (Clutch) with guest guitarist Jake E. Lee, and Ben Weinman (Dillinger Escape Plan) on the Metal Modem.

This video was captured directly from a digital cable boxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s HDMI output to MPEG4 in 1080i using a Game Capture HD and an HDMI splitter to remove HDCP.  Since it was captured from cable, it is interlaced, and no re-encoding has been performed.  If you are playing back on a computer, please enable de-interlacing on your media player.  See below for complete technical specs on the video.
